Color for emphasis or distinction

Restrained use of color is highly effective in organizing a narrative and calling attention to certain elements. Utilize existing resources for selection of appropriate palettes such as Color Brewer or Munsell. Use bold, saturated or contrasting colors to emphasize important details.

color narrative emphasis organization palettes graphics principles
